title: Understanding Motivational Science and Strategies for Real-World Transfer

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational psychology or motivation theories
context.additional_context: Blended curriculum for undergraduate students emphasizing exploration of motivational science theories and their application to daily life

learning_goals: Learners can write self-reflection reports analyzing their learning motivation based on motivational science theories
Learners can develop action plans for setting personal and academic goals by applying motivational theories
Learners can improve their learning strategies through peer feedback and present cases of applying them to real-world situations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
